block.p: American League BOSTON RED SOX--Placed SS Nomar Garciaparra on the 15-day disabled list. Called up INF Donnie Sadler from Pawtucket of the International League. CLEVELAND INDIANS--Activated RHP Bartolo Colon and OF Kenny Lofton from the 15-day disabled list. Designated RHP Bobby Witt for assignment. Sent OF Mark Whiten outright to Buffalo of the International League. DETROIT TIGERS--Placed 2B Damion Easley on the 15-day disabled, retroactive to May 9.

American League BOSTON RED SOX--Placed SS Nomar Garciaparra on the 15-day disabled list. Called up INF Donnie Sadler from Pawtucket of the International League. CLEVELAND INDIANS--Activated RHP Bartolo Colon and OF Kenny Lofton from the 15-day disabled list. Designated RHP Bobby Witt for assignment. Sent OF Mark Whiten outright to Buffalo of the International League. DETROIT TIGERS--Placed 2B Damion Easley on the 15-day disabled, retroactive to May 9.

National League CHICAGO CUBS--Traded LHP Mark Guthrie and cash to the Tampa Bay Devil Rays for 1B-OF Dave Martinez. MONTREAL EXPOS--Placed RHP Ugueth Urbina on the 15-day disabled list. Activated RHP Mike Thurman from the 15-day disabled list.

National Football League CLEVELAND BROWNS--Sign OL Chris Ruhman. Waived DB Marcus Washington. SEATTLE SEAHAWKS--Named Brian O'Connell broadcast coordinator. Canadian Football League WINNIPEG BLUE BOMBERS--Released RB Deland McCullough, DT Tyrone Rodgers and CB Eddie Thomas.
National Hockey League MINNESOTA WILD--Named Paul Charles amateur scout.
